name: Finished Racoon Bikini Game
description:
Best Played in full screen (some of the text might be too small to read sorry)

A game about building levels, collecting bikinis and being a raccoon. Each level starts with nothing. Drag and drop parts of the level from your toolbox and to a functioning level. Play your level by controlling the raccon and collecting all the bikinis! Make sure you can beat your own level though!

Created for the Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam.

(Minor update, made tutorial more intuitive)
